Verses: 1 pinbu Aaronin Kumaararaagiya Naadhaabum Abiyoovum Thanthan Thoobakalasaththai Eduththu, Avaigalil Akkiniyaiyum Adhinmel Thoobavarkkaththaiyum Pottu, Karththar Thangalukkuk Kattalaiyidaadha Anniya Akkiniyai Avarudaiya Sannidhiyil Konduvandhaargal.
2 appozhudhu Akkini Karththarudaiya Sannidhiyilirundhu Purappattu, Avargalaip Patchiththadhu; Avargal Karththarudaiya Sannidhiyil Seththaargal.

3 appozhudhu Mose Aaronai Nokki: Ennidaththil Serugiravargalaal Naan Parisuththampannappattu, Sagala Janangalukkum Munbaaga Naan Magimaippaduven Endru Karththar Sonnadhu Idhudhaan Endraan; Aaron Pesaamalirundhaan.

4 pinbu Mose Aaronin Siriya Thagappanaana Usiyelin Kumaararaagiya Meesavelaiyum Elsaabaanaiyum Azhaiththu: Neengal Kitta Vandhu, Ungal Sagodhararaip Parisuththa Sthalaththukku Munnindru Eduththu, Paalayaththukkup Purambe Kondupongal Endraan.
5 mose Sonnapadi Avargal Kittavandhu, Avargalai Avargal Uduththiyirundha Sattaigalodum Eduththup Paalayaththukkup Purambe Konduponaargal.

6 mose Aaronaiyum Eleyaasaar Iththaamaar Ennum Avan Kumaararaiyum Nokki: Neengal Saagaadhapadikkum, Sabaiyanaiththinmelum Kadunkobam Varaadhapadikkum, Neengal Ungal Thalaippaagaiyai Eduththuppodaamalum, Ungal Vasthirangalaik Kizhikkaamalum Iruppeergalaaga; Ungal Sagodhararaagiya Isravel Kudumbaththaar Yaavarum Karththar Koluththina Indha Akkinikkaagap Pulambuvaargalaaga.
7 neengal Saagaadhapadikku Aasarippuk Koodaaravaasalilirundhu Purappadaadhirungal; Karththarudaiya Abishegathailam Ungalmel Irukkiradhe Endraan; Avargal Moseyinudaiya Vaarththaiyinpadiye Seydhaargal.
8 karththar Aaronai Nokki:
9 neeyum Unnodekooda Un Kumaararum Saagaadhirukkavendumaanaal, Aasarippuk Koodaaraththukkul Pravesikkirapodhu, Dhraatcharasaththaiyum Madhuvaiyum Kudikkavendaam.
10 parisuththamulladharkum Parisuththamillaadhadharkum, Theettulladharkum Theettillaadhadharkum, Viththiyaasampannumpadikkum,
11 karththar Moseyaikkondu Isravel Puththirarukku Sonna Sagala Pramaanangalaiyum Avargalukkup Podhikkumpadikkum, Idhu Ungal Thalaimuraithorum Niththiya Kattalaiyaayirukkum Endraar.

12 mose Aaronaiyum Meedhiyaayirundha Avan Kumaararaagiya Eleyaasaaraiyum Iththaamaaraiyum Nokki: Neengal Karththarudaiya Thaganapaligalil Meedhiyaana Pojanapaliyai Eduththu, Palipeedaththandaiyile Pulippillaadhadhaagap Pusiyungal; Adhu Magaa Parisuththamaanadhu.
13 adhaip Parisuththa Sthalaththile Pusiyungal; Adhu Karththarudaiya Thaganapaligalil Unakkum Unkumaararukkum Erpaduththappattadhaayirukkiradhu; Ippadik Kattalai Petrirukkiren.

14 asaivaattum Maarkkandaththaiyum, Ereduththup Padaikkum Munnan Thodaiyaiyum, Neeyum Unnodekooda Un Kumaararum Kumaaraththigalum Suththamaana Sthalaththile Pusippeergalaaga; Isravel Puththirarudaiya Samaadhaanapaligalil Avaigal Unakkum Un Pillaigalukkum Kidaikkumpadi Erpaduththappattirukkiradhu.

15 kozhuppaagiya Thaganapaligalode Avargal Karththarudaiya Sannidhiyil Asaivaattum Paliyaaga Asaivaattumpadi Ereduththup Padaikkum Munnan Thodaiyaiyum, Asaivaattum Maarkkandaththaiyum Konduvaruvaargal; Adhu Karththar Kattalaiyittapadiye Unakkum Unpillaigalukkum Niththiya Kattalaiyaaga Erpaduththappattirukkiradhu Endraan.

16 paavanivaaranapaliyaaga Seluththappatta Vellaattukkadaavai Mose Thedippaarththaan; Adhu Thaganikkappattirundhadhu; Aagaiyaal, Meedhiyaayirundha Eleyaasaar Iththaamaar Ennum Aaronin Kumaararmel Avan Kobankondu:

17 paavanivaaranapaliyai Neengal Parisuththa Sthalaththil Pusiyaamarponadhenna? Adhu Magaa Parisuththamaayirukkiradhe; Sabaiyin Akkiramaththai Sumandhu Theerppadharkuk Karththarudaiya Sannidhiyil Avargalukkaagap Paavanivirththi Seyyumporuttu, Adhai Ungalukkuk Koduththaare.
18 adhin Raththam Parisuththa Sthalaththukkulle Konduvarappadavillaiye; Naan Kattalaiyittapadi Neengal Adhaip Parisuththa Sthalaththil Pusikkavendiyadhaayirundhadhe Endraan.

19 appozhudhu Aaron Moseyai Nokki: Avargal Thangal Paavanivaaranapaliyaiyum, Thangal Sarvaanga Thaganapaliyaiyum Karththarudaiya Sannidhiyil Seluththina Indrudhaane Enakku Ippadi Nerittadhe; Paavanivaaranapaliyai Indru Naan Pusiththenaanaal, Adhu Karththarin Paarvaikku Nandraai Irukkumo Endraan.
20 mose Adhaik Kettapodhu Amaidhalaayirundhaan.
